description: The Vipp coffee cup is hand-casted in high-quality porcelain. For a matte finish and a smooth interior, the coffee cup is glazed on the inside and hand-polished on the outside. Available in packages of two.
material: Double-layer porcelain. View care instructions

description: The Vipp espresso cup is hand-casted in high-quality porcelain. For a matte finish and a smooth interior, the espresso cup is glazed on the inside and hand-polished on the outside. Available in packages of two.
material: Double-layer porcelain. View care instructions

description: This Vipp bowl is the larger of two bowls in the Vipp collection and is hand-casted in high-quality porcelain. For a matte finish and a smooth interior, the bowl is glazed on the inside and hand-polished on the outside.
material: Double-layer porcelain. View care instructions

description: The Vipp plate is hand-casted in high-quality porcelain. For a matte finish and a smooth interior, the plate is glazed on the inside and hand-polished on the outside. Available in packages of two.

description: The Vipp vase is a decorative item for the living room. This translucent, mouth-blown glass vase features a distinct smoke-coloured finish designed in collaboration with ceramicist Annemette Kissow.
material: Mouth-blown glass. View care instructions

description: The Vipp ceramic pot is hand-casted in high-quality white porcelain. This pot is well-suited for both eatable and decorative greenery or as a storage solution for everyday kitchen utensils.
material: Double-layer porcelain. View care instructions

description: The Vipp lunch plate is a medium-sized plate for the dining table. Just like the other Vipp plates, it is hand-casted in high-quality porcelain. For a matte finish and a smooth interior, the plate is glazed on the inside and hand-polished on the outside. Available in packages of two.
material: Porcelain. View care instructions

description: The Vipp dinner plate is made for the dining table and is hand-casted in high-quality porcelain. Just like the smaller plate in the Vipp assortment, the dinner plate is glazed on the inside for a smooth interior and hand-polished on the outside for a matte finish. Available in packages of two.
material: Porcelain. View care instructions

description: The round Vipp placemat is made to protect delicate surfaces on round dining tables. Also available in a square version, the Vipp placemat is easy to clean with a damp cloth or in the washing machine.
material: Silicone, machine washable. View care instructions

description: The Vipp placemat protects delicate surfaces on the dining table. Made to be used daily, the placemat is easy to clean with a damp cloth or in the washing machine. Available in packages of four.
material: Soft silicone rubber. View care instructions

description: Vipp cloth napkins for the kitchen or dining table are woven from pure linen for optimal water absorption and high durability. Available in three colours in sets of 4 pieces.
material: 100% linen. View care instructions

description: Vipp tea towels for the kitchen are woven in a two-toned organic cotton for premium quality and water absorption. The tea towels are fitted with a rubber strap imprinted with washing instructions. Available in two colours in boxes of 2 pieces.
material: Organic cotton. Soak before use. View care instructions

description: The Vipp suction hook is a handy helper in the bathroom or kitchen. Easily mount it on any plain surface – even in the shower -  and hang items such as the Vipp shower wiper or dishwashing brush. Available in packages of two.
material: Stainless steel, rubber, plastic. View care instructions

description: The Vipp clip is an ideal tool to gather your papers or hang your poster. Attach the clip using the super magnet or the included wall hook. The Vipp clip comes with included wall hooks in a set of two.
material: Powder-coated aluminium, steel, magnic, plastic. View care instructions

description: Although built in scale 1:5, the Vipp miniature pedal bin has an operational pedal and remains true to the design, proportions and materials of the full-size bin – both in proportions and choice of materials.
material: Powder-coated aluminium, stainless steel, silicone. View care instructions

description: The Vipp flashlight is a trusted tool to help you find your way outdoors. The Vipp561 flashlight has a powerful beam distance and is equipped with a handy rubber string to carry it around your neck.
material: Stainless steel, silicone. View care instructions

description: For breakfast in bed or coffee on the terrace, the Vipp mini table is a multifunctional piece of furniture. The legs of the mini table can be folded to save space, and a dishwasher-proof rubber mat adds a functional detail.
material: Powder-coated aluminium, stainless steel, silicone, plastic. View care instructions

description: Vipp bin liners are custom-designed to fit your Vipp pedal bin. Available in boxes with 8 rolls of bags. Remember to choose the size that fits your bin.

description: 300 pages of kitchen inspiration wrapped in the format of a coffee table book, ‘Twenty Homes — One Kitchen’ welcomes you into twenty distinctive homes across four continents, nine countries and eighteen cities. The residences all differ in size, location and aesthetic, but share a common denominator in their choice of kitchen.
